name: Mozambique Assembly 2018
content: Getenergy in association with the Energy Council will host the Mozambique Assembly in partnership with the government of Mozambique in Maputo, 12-13 March 2018\. Join Getenergy for discussions on how to develop sustainable, localised oil & gas projects in Mozambique through building partnerships between Governments, industry, NGOs and the education and training community. Sessions will be open discussions on how to improve the local workforce and how to maximise the economic potential of hydrocarbons for national development in the region. Country focused workshops will identify emerging corporate development opportunities and how to structure the country's national content strategy. Price: USD 995 - USD 2995 Speakers: Janet Museveni First lady & Honourable Minister - Minister of Education and Sports Uganda, H.E. President Filipe Nyusi - Republic of Mozambique, Venue details: Polana Serena Hotel, Avenida Julius Nyerere 1380, Maputo, Mozambique
